explanation: Several opinions point to BTC recently topping out near 108k and failing to hold above it, with some users noting a reversal and smart money selling. There is mention of a strong support at 107k, but the prevailing sentiment after the failed breakout is negative or cautious. While a few users are still holding or calling to buy, the majority reflect disappointment or suggest exiting after a failed rally.
representative_opinions: Kudjaks: it did pumped well and touched over top of the channel, 108,4k breakout
Dd: Smart money selling moonboy buying
Tiger Eye: Trend line is holding up quite good, if we slip 107 is a strong support
Din Djarin: what? how did we lose 108. Damnit you guys. BUY!
TioRyo: In long trade use stop on the daily or weekly candle. In short trade use stop loss on the last daily or weekly candle. Leverage only on TOPS AND BOTTOM.
